name: Sand Stream
entries: At 3rd level, you can weave sand into your attacks. Around you swirls a localized sandstorm. The standstorm has a 5ft radius, this number increases as you gain more levels in this class. The sandstorm follows your movement. While the sandstorm is around you, the first attack you make each turn has advantage, and the first attack made against you or an ally by a creature within its radius each round has disadvantage.
Whenever your Proficiency Bonus Increases, the sandstormâ€™s radius increases by 5ft.
